adaptability.description: This Pokemon's same-type attack bonus (STAB) is 2 instead of 1.5.
adaptability.name: Adaptability

aftermath.description: If this Pokemon is KOed with a contact move, that move's user loses 1/4 its max HP.
aftermath.name: Aftermath

analytic.description: This Pokemon's attacks have 1.3x power if it is the last to move in a turn.
analytic.name: Analytic

angerpoint.description: If this Pokemon (not its substitute) takes a critical hit, its Attack is raised 12 stages.
angerpoint.name: Anger Point

anticipation.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon shudders if any foe has a supereffective or OHKO move.
anticipation.name: Anticipation

arenatrap.description: Prevents opposing Pokemon from choosing to switch out unless they are airborne.
arenatrap.name: Arena Trap

aromaveil.description: Protects user/allies from Attract, Disable, Encore, Heal Block, Taunt, and Torment.
aromaveil.name: Aroma Veil

battlearmor.description: This Pokemon cannot be struck by a critical hit.
battlearmor.name: Battle Armor

bigpecks.description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's Defense stat stage.
bigpecks.name: Big Pecks

blaze.description: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's offensive stat is 1.5x with Fire attacks.
blaze.name: Blaze

bulletproof.description: This Pokemon is immune to bullet moves.
bulletproof.name: Bulletproof

cheekpouch.description: If this Pokemon eats a Berry, it restores 1/3 of its max HP after the Berry's effect.
cheekpouch.name: Cheek Pouch

chlorophyll.description: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.
chlorophyll.name: Chlorophyll

clearbody.description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.
clearbody.name: Clear Body

cloudnine.description: While this Pokemon is active, the effects of weather conditions are disabled.
cloudnine.name: Cloud Nine

comatose.description: This Pokemon cannot be statused, and is considered to be asleep.
comatose.name: Comatose

commander.description: If ally is Dondozo: this Pokemon cannot act or be hit, +2 to all Dondozo's stats.
commander.name: Commander

competitive.description: This Pokemon's Sp. Atk is raised by 2 for each of its stats that is lowered by a foe.
competitive.name: Competitive

compoundeyes.description: This Pokemon's moves have their accuracy multiplied by 1.3.
compoundeyes.name: Compound Eyes

contrary.description: If this Pokemon has a stat stage raised it is lowered instead, and vice versa.
contrary.name: Contrary

corrosion.description: This Pokemon can poison or badly poison a Pokemon regardless of its typing.
corrosion.name: Corrosion

cottondown.description: If this Pokemon is hit, it lowers the Speed of all other Pokemon on the field 1 stage.
cottondown.name: Cotton Down

cursedbody.description: If this Pokemon is hit by an attack, there is a 30% chance that move gets disabled.
cursedbody.name: Cursed Body

cutecharm.description: 30% chance of infatuating Pokemon of the opposite gender if they make contact.
cutecharm.name: Cute Charm

damp.description: Prevents Explosion/Mind Blown/Misty Explosion/Self-Destruct/Aftermath while active.
damp.name: Damp

defeatist.description: While this Pokemon has 1/2 or less of its max HP, its Attack and Sp. Atk are halved.
defeatist.name: Defeatist

defiant.description: This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 2 for each of its stats that is lowered by a foe.
defiant.name: Defiant

disguise.description: (Mimikyu only) The first hit it takes is blocked, and it takes 1/8 HP damage instead.
disguise.name: Disguise

download.description: On switch-in, Attack or Sp. Atk is raised 1 stage based on the foes' weaker Defense.
download.name: Download

drizzle.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Rain Dance.
drizzle.name: Drizzle

drought.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Sunny Day.
drought.name: Drought

dryskin.description: This Pokemon is healed 1/4 by Water, 1/8 by Rain; is hurt 1.25x by Fire, 1/8 by Sun.
dryskin.name: Dry Skin

earlybird.description: This Pokemon's sleep counter drops by 2 instead of 1.
earlybird.name: Early Bird

effectspore.description: 30% chance of poison/paralysis/sleep on others making contact with this Pokemon.
effectspore.name: Effect Spore

emergencyexit.description: This Pokemon switches out when it reaches 1/2 or less of its maximum HP.
emergencyexit.name: Emergency Exit

filter.description: This Pokemon receives 3/4 damage from supereffective attacks.
filter.name: Filter

flamebody.description: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be burned.
flamebody.name: Flame Body

flareboost.description: While this Pokemon is burned, its special attacks have 1.5x power.
flareboost.name: Flare Boost

flashfire.description: This Pokemon's Fire attacks do 1.5x damage if hit by one Fire move; Fire immunity.
flashfire.name: Flash Fire

flowerveil.description: This side's Grass types can't have stats lowered or status inflicted by other Pokemon.
flowerveil.name: Flower Veil

fluffy.description: This Pokemon takes 1/2 damage from contact moves, 2x damage from Fire moves.
fluffy.name: Fluffy

forewarn.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon is alerted to the foes' move with the highest power.
forewarn.name: Forewarn

friendguard.description: This Pokemon's allies receive 3/4 damage from other Pokemon's attacks.
friendguard.name: Friend Guard

frisk.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon identifies the held items of all opposing Pokemon.
frisk.name: Frisk

galewings.description: If this Pokemon is at full HP, its Flying-type moves have their priority increased by 1.
galewings.name: Gale Wings

gluttony.description: This Pokemon eats Berries at 1/2 max HP or less instead of their usual 1/4 max HP.
gluttony.name: Gluttony

goodasgold.description: This Pokemon is immune to Status moves.
goodasgold.name: Good as Gold

gooey.description: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon have their Speed lowered by 1 stage.
gooey.name: Gooey

grassysurge.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Grassy Terrain.
grassysurge.name: Grassy Surge

guarddog.description: Immune to Intimidate. Intimidated: +1 Attack. Cannot be forced to switch out.
guarddog.name: Guard Dog

guts.description: If this Pokemon is statused, its Attack is 1.5x; ignores burn halving physical damage.
guts.name: Guts

harvest.description: If last item used is a Berry, 50% chance to restore it each end of turn. 100% in Sun.
harvest.name: Harvest

healer.description: 30% chance this Pokemon's ally has its status cured at the end of each turn.
healer.name: Healer

hustle.description: This Pokemon's Attack is 1.5x and accuracy of its physical attacks is 0.8x.
hustle.name: Hustle

hydration.description: This Pokemon has its status cured at the end of each turn if Rain Dance is active.
hydration.name: Hydration

hypercutter.description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's Attack stat stage.
hypercutter.name: Hyper Cutter

icebody.description: If Snow is active, this Pokemon heals 1/16 of its max HP each turn.
icebody.name: Ice Body

iceface.description: If Eiscue, the first physical hit it takes deals 0 damage. Effect is restored in Snow.
iceface.name: Ice Face

illuminate.description: This Pokemon's accuracy can't be lowered by others; ignores their evasiveness stat.
illuminate.name: Illuminate

illusion.description: This Pokemon appears as the last Pokemon in the party until it takes direct damage.
illusion.name: Illusion

immunity.description: This Pokemon cannot be poisoned. Gaining this Ability while poisoned cures it.
immunity.name: Immunity

imposter.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon Transforms into the opposing Pokemon that is facing it.
imposter.name: Imposter

infiltrator.description: Moves ignore substitutes and foe's Reflect/Light Screen/Safeguard/Mist/Aurora Veil.
infiltrator.name: Infiltrator

innardsout.description: If this Pokemon is KOed with a move, that move's user loses an equal amount of HP.
innardsout.name: Innards Out

innerfocus.description: This Pokemon cannot be made to flinch. Immune to Intimidate.
innerfocus.name: Inner Focus

insomnia.description: This Pokemon cannot fall asleep. Gaining this Ability while asleep cures it.
insomnia.name: Insomnia

intimidate.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon lowers the Attack of opponents by 1 stage.
intimidate.name: Intimidate

ironbarbs.description: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon lose 1/8 of their max HP.
ironbarbs.name: Iron Barbs

ironfist.description: This Pokemon's punch-based attacks have 1.2x power. Sucker Punch is not boosted.
ironfist.name: Iron Fist

justified.description: This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 1 stage after it is damaged by a Dark-type move.
justified.name: Justified

keeneye.description: This Pokemon's accuracy can't be lowered by others; ignores their evasiveness stat.
keeneye.name: Keen Eye

klutz.description: This Pokemon's held item has no effect, except Macho Brace. Fling cannot be used.
klutz.name: Klutz

leafguard.description: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon cannot be statused and Rest will fail for it.
leafguard.name: Leaf Guard

levitate.description: This Pokemon is immune to Ground; Gravity/Ingrain/Smack Down/Iron Ball nullify it.
levitate.name: Levitate

libero.description: This Pokemon's type changes to the type of the move it is using. Once per switch-in.
libero.name: Libero

lightningrod.description: This Pokemon draws Electric moves to itself to raise Sp. Atk by 1; Electric immunity.
lightningrod.name: Lightning Rod

limber.description: This Pokemon cannot be paralyzed. Gaining this Ability while paralyzed cures it.
limber.name: Limber

lingeringaroma.description: Making contact with this Pokemon has the attacker's Ability become Lingering Aroma.
lingeringaroma.name: Lingering Aroma

liquidooze.description: This Pokemon damages those draining HP from it for as much as they would heal.
liquidooze.name: Liquid Ooze

liquidvoice.description: This Pokemon's sound-based moves become Water type.
liquidvoice.name: Liquid Voice

longreach.description: This Pokemon's attacks do not make contact with the target.
longreach.name: Long Reach

magicbounce.description: This Pokemon blocks certain Status moves and bounces them back to the user.
magicbounce.name: Magic Bounce

magicguard.description: This Pokemon can only be damaged by direct attacks.
magicguard.name: Magic Guard

magician.description: If this Pokemon has no item, it steals the item off a Pokemon it hits with an attack.
magician.name: Magician

magmaarmor.description: This Pokemon cannot be frozen. Gaining this Ability while frozen cures it.
magmaarmor.name: Magma Armor

magnetpull.description: Prevents opposing Steel-type Pokemon from choosing to switch out.
magnetpull.name: Magnet Pull

marvelscale.description: If this Pokemon has a non-volatile status condition, its Defense is multiplied by 1.5.
marvelscale.name: Marvel Scale

minus.description: If an active ally has this Ability or the Plus Ability, this Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x.
minus.name: Minus

mirrorarmor.description: If this Pokemon's stat stages would be lowered, the attacker's are lowered instead.
mirrorarmor.name: Mirror Armor

moldbreaker.description: This Pokemon's moves and their effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
moldbreaker.name: Mold Breaker

moody.description: Boosts a random stat (except accuracy/evasion) +2 and another stat -1 every turn.
moody.name: Moody

motordrive.description: This Pokemon's Speed is raised 1 stage if hit by an Electric move; Electric immunity.
motordrive.name: Motor Drive

moxie.description: This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 1 stage if it attacks and KOes another Pokemon.
moxie.name: Moxie

multiscale.description: If this Pokemon is at full HP, damage taken from attacks is halved.
multiscale.name: Multiscale

mummy.description: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon have their Ability changed to Mummy.
mummy.name: Mummy

naturalcure.description: This Pokemon has its non-volatile status condition cured when it switches out.
naturalcure.name: Natural Cure

neutralizinggas.description: While this Pokemon is active, Abilities have no effect.
neutralizinggas.name: Neutralizing Gas

noguard.description: Every move used by or against this Pokemon will always hit.
noguard.name: No Guard

oblivious.description: This Pokemon cannot be infatuated or taunted. Immune to Intimidate.
oblivious.name: Oblivious

opportunist.description: When an opposing Pokemon has a stat stage raised, this Pokemon copies the effect.
opportunist.name: Opportunist

overcoat.description: This Pokemon is immune to powder moves, Sandstorm damage, and Effect Spore.
overcoat.name: Overcoat

overgrow.description: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's offensive stat is 1.5x with Grass attacks.
overgrow.name: Overgrow

owntempo.description: This Pokemon cannot be confused. Immune to Intimidate.
owntempo.name: Own Tempo

pastelveil.description: This Pokemon and its allies cannot be poisoned. On switch-in, cures poisoned allies.
pastelveil.name: Pastel Veil

pickpocket.description: If this Pokemon has no item and is hit by a contact move, it steals the attacker's item.
pickpocket.name: Pickpocket

pickup.description: If this Pokemon has no item, it finds one used by an adjacent Pokemon this turn.
pickup.name: Pickup

pixilate.description: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Fairy type and have 1.2x power.
pixilate.name: Pixilate

plus.description: If an active ally has this Ability or the Minus Ability, this Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x.
plus.name: Plus

poisonheal.description: This Pokemon is healed by 1/8 of its max HP each turn when poisoned; no HP loss.
poisonheal.name: Poison Heal

poisonpoint.description: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be poisoned.
poisonpoint.name: Poison Point

poisontouch.description: This Pokemon's contact moves have a 30% chance of poisoning.
poisontouch.name: Poison Touch

powerspot.description: This Pokemon's allies have the power of their moves multiplied by 1.3.
powerspot.name: Power Spot

prankster.description: This Pokemon's Status moves have priority raised by 1, but Dark types are immune.
prankster.name: Prankster

pressure.description: If this Pokemon is the target of a foe's move, that move loses one additional PP.
pressure.name: Pressure

propellertail.description: This Pokemon's moves cannot be redirected to a different target by any effect.
propellertail.name: Propeller Tail

protean.description: This Pokemon's type changes to the type of the move it is using. Once per switch-in.
protean.name: Protean

purifyingsalt.description: Ghost damage to this Pokemon dealt with a halved offensive stat; can't be statused.
purifyingsalt.name: Purifying Salt

queenlymajesty.description: This Pokemon and its allies are protected from opposing priority moves.
queenlymajesty.name: Queenly Majesty

quickfeet.description: If this Pokemon is statused, its Speed is 1.5x; ignores Speed drop from paralysis.
quickfeet.name: Quick Feet

raindish.description: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon heals 1/16 of its max HP each turn.
raindish.name: Rain Dish

rattled.description: Speed is raised 1 stage if hit by a Bug-, Dark-, or Ghost-type attack, or Intimidated.
rattled.name: Rattled

reckless.description: This Pokemon's attacks with recoil or crash damage have 1.2x power; not Struggle.
reckless.name: Reckless

refrigerate.description: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Ice type and have 1.2x power.
refrigerate.name: Refrigerate

regenerator.description: This Pokemon restores 1/3 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when it switches out.
regenerator.name: Regenerator

rivalry.description: This Pokemon's attacks do 1.25x on same gender targets; 0.75x on opposite gender.
rivalry.name: Rivalry

rockhead.description: This Pokemon does not take recoil damage besides Struggle/Life Orb/crash damage.
rockhead.name: Rock Head

roughskin.description: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon lose 1/8 of their max HP.
roughskin.name: Rough Skin

sandforce.description: This Pokemon's Ground/Rock/Steel attacks do 1.3x in Sandstorm; immunity to it.
sandforce.name: Sand Force

sandrush.description: If Sandstorm is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled; immunity to Sandstorm.
sandrush.name: Sand Rush

sandstream.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Sandstorm.
sandstream.name: Sand Stream

sandveil.description: If Sandstorm is active, this Pokemon's evasiveness is 1.25x; immunity to Sandstorm.
sandveil.name: Sand Veil

sapsipper.description: This Pokemon's Attack is raised 1 stage if hit by a Grass move; Grass immunity.
sapsipper.name: Sap Sipper

scrappy.description: Fighting, Normal moves hit Ghost. Immune to Intimidate.
scrappy.name: Scrappy

serenegrace.description: This Pokemon's moves have their secondary effect chance doubled.
serenegrace.name: Serene Grace

sharpness.description: This Pokemon's slicing moves have their power multiplied by 1.5.
sharpness.name: Sharpness

shedskin.description: This Pokemon has a 33% chance to have its status cured at the end of each turn.
shedskin.name: Shed Skin

sheerforce.description: This Pokemon's attacks with secondary effects have 1.3x power; nullifies the effects.
sheerforce.name: Sheer Force

shellarmor.description: This Pokemon cannot be struck by a critical hit.
shellarmor.name: Shell Armor

shielddust.description: This Pokemon is not affected by the secondary effect of another Pokemon's attack.
shielddust.name: Shield Dust

simple.description: When one of this Pokemon's stat stages is raised or lowered, the amount is doubled.
simple.name: Simple

skilllink.description: This Pokemon's multi-hit attacks always hit the maximum number of times.
skilllink.name: Skill Link

slowstart.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon's Attack and Speed are halved for 5 turns.
slowstart.name: Slow Start

slushrush.description: If Snow is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.
slushrush.name: Slush Rush

sniper.description: If this Pokemon strikes with a critical hit, the damage is multiplied by 1.5.
sniper.name: Sniper

snowcloak.description: If Snow is active, this Pokemon's evasiveness is 1.25x.
snowcloak.name: Snow Cloak

snowwarning.description: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Snow.
snowwarning.name: Snow Warning

solarpower.description: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x; loses 1/8 max HP per turn.
solarpower.name: Solar Power

solidrock.description: This Pokemon receives 3/4 damage from supereffective attacks.
solidrock.name: Solid Rock

soundproof.description: This Pokemon is immune to sound-based moves, unless it used the move.
soundproof.name: Soundproof

speedboost.description: This Pokemon's Speed is raised 1 stage at the end of each full turn on the field.
speedboost.name: Speed Boost

stakeout.description: This Pokemon's offensive stat is doubled against a target that switched in this turn.
stakeout.name: Stakeout

stall.description: This Pokemon moves last among Pokemon using the same or greater priority moves.
stall.name: Stall

stamina.description: This Pokemon's Defense is raised by 1 stage after it is damaged by a move.
stamina.name: Stamina

stancechange.description: If Aegislash, changes Forme to Blade before attacks and Shield before King's Shield.
stancechange.name: Stance Change

static.description: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be paralyzed.
static.name: Static

steadfast.description: If this Pokemon flinches, its Speed is raised by 1 stage.
steadfast.name: Steadfast

steelworker.description: This Pokemon's offensive stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Steel-type attack.
steelworker.name: Steelworker

steelyspirit.description: This Pokemon and its allies' Steel-type moves have their power multiplied by 1.5.
steelyspirit.name: Steely Spirit

stench.description: This Pokemon's attacks without a chance to flinch gain a 10% chance to flinch.
stench.name: Stench

stickyhold.description: This Pokemon cannot lose its held item due to another Pokemon's Ability or attack.
stickyhold.name: Sticky Hold

stormdrain.description: This Pokemon draws Water moves to itself to raise Sp. Atk by 1; Water immunity.
stormdrain.name: Storm Drain

strongjaw.description: This Pokemon's bite-based attacks have 1.5x power. Bug Bite is not boosted.
strongjaw.name: Strong Jaw

sturdy.description: If this Pokemon is at full HP, it survives one hit with at least 1 HP. Immune to OHKO.
sturdy.name: Sturdy

suctioncups.description: This Pokemon cannot be forced to switch out by another Pokemon's attack or item.
suctioncups.name: Suction Cups

superluck.description: This Pokemon's critical hit ratio is raised by 1 stage.
superluck.name: Super Luck

surgesurfer.description: If Electric Terrain is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.
surgesurfer.name: Surge Surfer

swarm.description: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's offensive stat is 1.5x with Bug attacks.
swarm.name: Swarm

sweetveil.description: This Pokemon and its allies cannot fall asleep; those already asleep do not wake up.
sweetveil.name: Sweet Veil

swiftswim.description: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.
swiftswim.name: Swift Swim

symbiosis.description: If an ally uses its item, this Pokemon gives its item to that ally immediately.
symbiosis.name: Symbiosis

synchronize.description: If another Pokemon burns/poisons/paralyzes this Pokemon, it also gets that status.
synchronize.name: Synchronize

tangledfeet.description: This Pokemon's evasiveness is doubled as long as it is confused.
tangledfeet.name: Tangled Feet

tanglinghair.description: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon have their Speed lowered by 1 stage.
tanglinghair.name: Tangling Hair

technician.description: This Pokemon's moves of 60 power or less have 1.5x power, including Struggle.
technician.name: Technician

telepathy.description: This Pokemon does not take damage from attacks made by its allies.
telepathy.name: Telepathy

thickfat.description: Fire-/Ice-type moves against this Pokemon deal damage with a halved offensive stat.
thickfat.name: Thick Fat

tintedlens.description: This Pokemon's attacks that are not very effective on a target deal double damage.
tintedlens.name: Tinted Lens

torrent.description: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's offensive stat is 1.5x with Water attacks.
torrent.name: Torrent

toughclaws.description: This Pokemon's contact moves have their power multiplied by 1.3.
toughclaws.name: Tough Claws

toxicdebris.description: If this Pokemon is hit by a physical attack, Toxic Spikes are set on the opposing side.
toxicdebris.name: Toxic Debris

trace.description: On switch-in, or when it can, this Pokemon copies a random adjacent foe's Ability.
trace.name: Trace

triage.description: This Pokemon's healing moves have their priority increased by 3.
triage.name: Triage

truant.description: This Pokemon skips every other turn instead of using a move.
truant.name: Truant

unaware.description: This Pokemon ignores other Pokemon's stat stages when taking or doing damage.
unaware.name: Unaware

unburden.description: Speed is doubled on held item loss; boost is lost if it switches, gets new item/Ability.
unburden.name: Unburden

unnerve.description: While this Pokemon is active, it prevents opposing Pokemon from using their Berries.
unnerve.name: Unnerve

vitalspirit.description: This Pokemon cannot fall asleep. Gaining this Ability while asleep cures it.
vitalspirit.name: Vital Spirit

voltabsorb.description: This Pokemon heals 1/4 of its max HP when hit by Electric moves; Electric immunity.
voltabsorb.name: Volt Absorb

waterabsorb.description: This Pokemon heals 1/4 of its max HP when hit by Water moves; Water immunity.
waterabsorb.name: Water Absorb

waterveil.description: This Pokemon cannot be burned. Gaining this Ability while burned cures it.
waterveil.name: Water Veil

weakarmor.description: If a physical attack hits this Pokemon, Defense is lowered by 1, Speed is raised by 2.
weakarmor.name: Weak Armor

wellbakedbody.description: This Pokemon's Defense is raised 2 stages if hit by a Fire move; Fire immunity.
wellbakedbody.name: Well-Baked Body

whitesmoke.description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.
whitesmoke.name: White Smoke

wimpout.description: This Pokemon switches out when it reaches 1/2 or less of its maximum HP.
wimpout.name: Wimp Out

windrider.description: Attack raised by 1 if hit by a wind move or Tailwind begins. Wind move immunity.
windrider.name: Wind Rider

wonderguard.description: This Pokemon can only be damaged by supereffective moves and indirect damage.
wonderguard.name: Wonder Guard

wonderskin.description: Status moves with accuracy checks are 50% accurate when used on this Pokemon.
wonderskin.name: Wonder Skin

zenmode.description: If Darmanitan, at end of turn changes Mode to Standard if > 1/2 max HP, else Zen.
zenmode.name: Zen Mode
